plugs.name: Type 1
plugs.description: Used in North America and some other countries, with a maximum charging power of 7.4 kW.

plugs.name: Type 2
plugs.description: Used in Europe, with a maximum charging power of 22 kW.

plugs.name: CCS
plugs.description: Combined Charging System, used in North America and Europe, with a maximum charging power of 350 kW.

plugs.name: CHAdeMO
plugs.description: Used in Japan and some other countries, with a maximum charging power of 62.5 kW.

plugs.name: Tesla Supercharger
plugs.description: Used by Tesla vehicles, with a maximum charging power of 250 kW.
